title: Bitcoin ‘Going To Take Over’—Tesla CEO Elon Musk Backs Shock $40 Trillion U.S. Dollar Collapse Warning Amid Price Boom
description: Tesla billionaire Elon Musk has restarted his campaign against out of control U.S. government spending, backing a warning that bitcoin could “take over” from the U.S. dollar...
content: Bitcoin has surged over the last year, propelled higher by Wall Streets embrace of crypto and U.S. president Donald Trumps support (despite Google revealing a serious BlackRock bitcoin nightmare just… [+3236 chars]
